h2_title: Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides
content: You can generally stay close to this boss, but just watch out for its roar that will stun you for a few seconds. To combat Jiao-Loong of Waves, you'll want to use heavy attacks. It's not so steady on its feet, so you can easily knock it over or at least temporarily stun it. This will give you longer periods of time to give it a beatdown without interruption. If you use the Plantain Fan here, it'll be constantly knocked down on the floor, giving you even more time to attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jiao-Loong_of_Waves.md', within the main section titled 'Jiao-Loong of Waves', specifically from the subsection 'Jiao-Loong of Waves Boss Fight and Guides'.
The content is as follows:
You can generally stay close to this boss, but just watch out for its roar that will stun you for a few seconds. To combat Jiao-Loong of Waves, you'll want to use heavy attacks. It's not so steady on its feet, so you can easily knock it over or at least temporarily stun it. This will give you longer periods of time to give it a beatdown without interruption. If you use the Plantain Fan here, it'll be constantly knocked down on the floor, giving you even more time to attack.
